Hi Noah,

Actually I have a problem when using default configuration. The problem is,
I need to run this job daily. That means the job should be finished within
one day. With the default max-depth and max-hops this is not possible. Do
you have a solution to this?

Regards

--001a1130d20201be0004ed4f8ebf
